fields.name: Teaching :user:
fields.value:
Any declaritive statement will teach the bot. For example someone saying ```twitch is down again``` will teach the bot this response, asking later ```@:user: twitch``` will make the bot respond
                                                        ```I heard twitch is down again```

fields.name: Giving :user: amnesia
fields.value:
You can make the bot forget a phrase with
                                                        ```@:user: forget <keyword>```
                                                        If the bot already knows a fact, you will usually have to tell it to forget the fact, before it will accept a new one.

fields.name: Configuration
fields.value: Users with the manage messages permission on channel can configure channel-specific bot settings. For help on these settings, type ```@:user: help config``` on channel.

fields.name: Other commands
fields.value:
You can ask the bot where he learned a phrase by asking:
```@:user:, who told you about <keyword>?```
A status report can be obtained by asking the bot:
```@:user: status```
Note that the bot will only talk on channels, and not in private message, and will only respond when mentioned, although it will silently learn all it observes.

fields.name: Advanced commands
fields.value: Further advanced commands are available, for info on them type ```@:user: help advanced```
